thread.title: Campaign to send kids to see 'Black Panther' goes viral

title: Campaign to send kids to see 'Black Panther' goes viral
text:
Campaign to send kids to see 'Black Panther' goes viral Monday, February 12, 2018 - 01:49 
New York native, Frederick Joseph, spearheaded a social media campaign dubbed #BlackPantherChallenge, which raised over $300,000 to send kids to see highly anticipated Marvel super hero movie, Black Panther.
